caption: Relating to the eligibility of land taken by condemnation for appraisal for ad valorem tax purposes as qualified open-space land.
undersanding:
Summary:
This bill amends the Tax Code regarding land eligibility for open-space appraisal. It affects non-resident aliens, including Chinese nationals, who own land in Texas. The bill maintains existing restrictions on land ownership registration requirements for foreign individuals and entities. Chinese nationals or entities with majority Chinese ownership must continue to register their land ownership if required by federal law.

中文总结：
该法案修改德克萨斯州税收法典中关于土地开放空间评估的资格规定。该法案影响包括中国公民在内的非居民外籍人士在德州的土地所有权。如果联邦法律要求，中国公民或由中国人占多数股权的实体必须继续登记其土地所有权。
